name: Project Zero
short_description: Project Zero is an massive multi-player online game where players will be able to live and experience the life as a mutant or a human being and face many challenges and problems during their lifetime including war, depression, and chaos. The player's choices in life can change the outcome of the game and no story is the same. You will encounter and face many different problems and it will be your choice on how to deal with them. Players will be brought into many eras of war throughout history and discover a few secrets that may be able to explain a little bit more about mutants. You will also encounter some occasional arguments with the President of the World as well as the people.
